website_summaries.verdict: Separates itself from the rest of the pack in terms of design quality. The best baby bottle set on the market today.
pros: A traditional design that also curbs colic and gas
cons: Comes at the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Poppin' bottles
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. The bottle brush is perfect for cleaning. The bottles work with my Spectra S2 pump. There's some leakage, especially if you don't line up the nipple in the white cap part perfectly. PSA: The nipples have number 1 for the smaller bottles, 2 for the bigger ones. I didn't notice this for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: EricaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves them
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy avent bottles after my baby stopped drinking 4 oz on dr browns and would cry after 1 oz . I thought she was sick until i opened an avent bottle i had from amazon welcome box (baby registry) . So i came to order this. I just love it. Hopefully my girl dont go tired of this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I loved the teal color. The color is darker than the picture shows, but they’re still cute.
customer_reviews.author: branjess20510

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It comes with 2 teal bottles, 2 size 2 nipples, and 2 blue and green pacifiers (0-6mos). Other reviewers have had problems with leaking... I haven't. They only leak if the vent (see photo) is facing down.
customer_reviews.author: A Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love Avent
customer_reviews.text: Avent is the only bottle we use. I’ve tried other ones with my baby but they leak or my baby chokes from the nipple. I just bought these bottles because I need more than 4 oz. I love the color and it’s a huge bonus to get the pacifiers! Great gift too!
customer_reviews.author: Steph01

customer_reviews.title: Great for my breastfed kids
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down my favorite bottle for my breastfed kids. We tried others, but these were the easiest when slipping back and forth between the bottle and the breast. Plus they don't have a bunch of parts to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Loving the mom life...I think

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my when I watch my grandchild. This saves her mom always packing one and dad sometimes forgetting...lol. These work great with no leaks. Not sure why some are having issues with this leaking unless nipple it not pulled through all the way. I also have a snap on holder by chiccco that allows her to hold her bottle and it works fine. I am very satisfied as it came with 2 bottles 2 number 2 nipples and 2 pacifiers a great savings.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for such amazing bottles ;D
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is EBF. She gets bottles with BM with dad or grandpa and the only bottles she really take are Como Tomo and these Avent natural bottles :) So happy to have found this deal. I do however had to change the nipples to size 0. The 4oz bottles have size 1 nipple and the 9oz have size 2. We are just using the smaller bottle with size 0 nipple just so she won't develop bottle preference :) For anyone lookong for bottles for their BF babies, these are something to try! PS. We only use the 4oz for feeding as she only takea about 3oz each feed at 13wks. Saving the 9oz bottles for pumping purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsiders

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Avent is a very good product. I love the different size bottles and bottle brush. These pacifiers are the only kind my newborn will take. My only complaint is that the newborn nipples are supposed to be slow flow but it was still coming out too fast for my newborn so I had to get a different nipple and bottle for the time being for my newborn. In a few weeks when her feeding picks up and she can handle a faster flow, I'm sure this will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Customer

customer_reviews.title: ONLY BOTTLES MY BABY WILL TAKE
customer_reviews.text: Every baby is different. I started with Dr. Browns but around 3 months old my baby started whining bad while eating and getting very gassy. I was then given a Tommy Tippee to try, she liked the wider nipple but it was still too wide for her. These bottles are absolutely perfect. Easy to clean, warm perfectly in my bottle warmer and the nipple fits my daughters mouth exactly how she likes it. Not too wide and not too small. I think she was also used to my nipple for the first few months, I alternated between breast feeding and bottle. So these are IDEAL for breastfed babies!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bunker

customer_reviews.title: good breastfeeding bottle
customer_reviews.text: i think these are the best bottles for breastfeeding that aren’t through the roof expensive. we were supplementing with formula and this was the only bottle my daughter would take. i like that they don’t have a lot of pieces. super easy to clean and my daughter had no problem going back and forth from breast to this bottle. the set is nice because it’s the most bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Gianna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bottles, they are perfect for my son! He is a micro preemie and we have tried several bottles with him I’ve the past couple months, the Avent natural are definitely the favorite so we have stuck with them as he grows! The color of these bottles is great too!! I can’t comment on the pacifiers as my son is very particular, and so far, he only likes the ones from the NICU. I will say one of the boxes (I ordered 2 sets) did not come with the pacifiers so I called Phillips and they immediately sent out a package in place of them with no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Rose

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my Grandbaby
customer_reviews.text: She seems to like them. She gets mad if I don't put them in her mouth fast enough. I suppose that is a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Leaks. Switched to another brand.
customer_reviews.text: Got this bottle for my little one and we are really disappointed. The moment baby starts drinking, the bottle starts leaking and it’s all over the baby and leaves baby all fussy and crying. There are many mothers out there who get breast milk after lots of pumping or they end up buying expensive formula. Now if the bottles start leaking, it will be a big problem for all the parents. It’s really frustrating because we tried buying a new set of bottle again and it leaked like the last time. We switched to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Love the Philips Avent
customer_reviews.text: We have been trying different baby bottles - Avent, Dr. Brown, Comotomo, and the one that came with the speCtra pump. So far Avent is our most favorite. It doesn't have too many parts like Dr. Brown (so it is easy to clean), and the nipple is wide enough so that the baby is easy to latch on nicely. It also seal pretty tight so what you mix and shake your formula, it doesn't leak. The only complain I might have is that the bottle cover is pretty tight, which is a bit hard to open when you trying to with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Pak Hin Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Leak prone
customer_reviews.text: I heard good things about these bottles so I bought 4 packs to help replace some of our older bottles from various brands as lids got lost, etc. I am very disappointed in them as they are leak prone. we have used other brands like comotomo and mam without any issues. I would like to see if I can return some of the bottles and replace them with mam. The bottle cleaning brush that is included is great.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Best bottles for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I have tried quite a few different bottles for my baby, and these are by far the best. She spits up the least amount with these, takes the least amount of time to drink from them, and they also are the easiest to disassemble, wash/sterilize, and reassemble. Wish I had purchased ONLY these from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Blixic

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby bottles Available!  Best gift for new moms!
customer_reviews.text: Avent is definitely the best baby brand and bottles on the market! I have tried them all with my newborn and she will not take to anything else! This kit is the best idea to buy or gift a new mom! Has everything she will need for the first 3 months plus! They last forever and are super easy to clean and even easier with their custom bottle brush that it comes with. The pacifier also mimics the bottle so your baby will take to them right away!
customer_reviews.author: Camille W Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because buying the bottles in their own is so expensive.. The picture doesn’t do the color justice it’s really a beautiful bottle and my daughter absolutely loves these pacifiers.. we actually tried many other brands and she wouldn’t take them then these cake with the bottles so I tried them and wow she loves them!! Definitely recommend the price and quality you can’t beat!
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles
customer_reviews.text: Great bottles. My son is 4 mo old, and refuses to take pacifier, was hoping these would work, but they didn't. I guess that's​a good problem to have. I still like the bottles and the pacis as well although the later we didn't get to use. I have had smaller bottles from them, and prefer these better than tippee Tommy I used with my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Ani K.

customer_reviews.title: Best. Bottles. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough great things about the Avent bottles! I had them for my son and now I have them for my daughter. The NICU recommended them and they come with the same pacifiers they use in the hospital. Easy to clean, easy to take apart and put together. The babies love them. Ordered 4 of these sets for her! The design is even better now than when my son used them 6 year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Nipple is too fast for a 4 month old!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as I do not like our DR Brown bottles, received these bottles and tried feeding my 4 month old with them, he about choked due to the fast flowing nipple. I received size 2 nipples, which when you tip the bottle over, the milk just flows out! The description states slow flow nipple which is false!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: When feeding our baby the grip is good. It’s a little bulky compared to the thin cheap bottles but the nipple is anatomical and she’s not spitting up as much. I like that it comes with stages 1 and 2 so we can graduate her to bigger bottle and nipple hole size. I know these will last until she’s out of the bottle phase. Excited not to have to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bottles
customer_reviews.text: Great product I love them. I hope my daughter loves them when she arrives. I will give an update after a couple months
customer_reviews.author: kerry

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bottles
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Avent brand. I used their bottles for all 3 of my children. This set is essential, you get your 9 and 3 oz bottles, soothies, and bottle brush cleaner. That is all you need to get started plus I love the color! I am breastfeeding and I also pump so the nipple is good for a breastfed baby. It’s also easy to grasp. My daughter was 4 months attempting to hold a 4 oz bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jaz

customer_reviews.title: ❗ Cheaper than Walmart❗
customer_reviews.text: These are the same type of bottles I used with my little girl and never had any problems with gas or upset belly. So I wanted to use them again with our new baby coming. You find a better selection on here and they are also cheaper than the Avent natural bottles you get from Walmart.. will definitely buy again if needed 💞😁
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love this set, but the flow is too fast for the level 1 nipple without using cereal
customer_reviews.text: *Update: these are the perfect bottles when adding cereal while still using the level 1 nipple. Without cereal, the flow is a little too fast. I love how these bottles are easy to clean, and the wide neck also makes it easier to fix bottles at 4 am in the dark without making a mess. My only complaints is that the level 1 nipple's flow is too fast. My baby would always have milk running down the sides of his mouth with every feeding. I have used Dr. Brown's bottles before & their level 1 nipple's flow is slower & no milk is wasted.
customer_reviews.author: TaShonna

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this set for getting started with bottle feeding. We weren't expecting to need bottles for a while, but I'm very glad that we had this in the house just in case. The included pacifiers were also much appreciated as we thought we weren't going to need these right away either. Haven't used the cleaning brush.
customer_reviews.author: mgrod

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product however was disappointed that it didn't come with the slow flow nipple needed for newborn. I had to order it separately and wait for it to arrive after struggling for several days. I think the added pacifiers are unnecessary in such a gift pack.
customer_reviews.author: ShopDrop

customer_reviews.title: Helps with reflux and gassiness
customer_reviews.text: My baby prefers these to dr browns bottles. She has had bad reflux and would get gassy despite colic drops but with these bottles the symptoms aren’t as bad and she is able to take more volume during her feeds. They’re also way easier to clean and not to mention the colors are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: celeste001

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Got these on sale and we love them! My son only uses dr brown and avent bottles. His favorite pacifiers are the avent ones so that’s not a surprise but he likes these so much! It sucks they don’t have an anti colic thing that goes inside but we haven’t had any problems so it’s all good.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Not very well
customer_reviews.text: The 4oz bottle is very inconvenient if you use it with electric broiler milk heating machine! The boiling water will be hidden under around the lid, leaking out and it will be very hot when you take it out to feed the baby. Every time when you use 4oz bottle with broiler machine,you need to use towel to wrap around the white lid ,avoid leaking hot water!not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this bottle the most!
customer_reviews.text: At first, we thought the bottle is too big which cover the nose of our newborn. However, he has grown since then and starting to love this bottle. We have tried Dr.Brown and some other brands without success. Love this set since it included a brush that fit the inside of these bottles perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Le

customer_reviews.title: Cute bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are the only bottles/nipples my daughter likes, so it's cool that they now come in different colors. I brought the teal and think they look super cute when she's using them. I just wish they came in a pack with something other than the level 1 nipple. Just another purchase you have to make if your child is beyond that level.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Newborn!
customer_reviews.text: These bottles worked great for my newborn! The nipples each have a number on them so you can have a slow flow rate (1) or increase it at a later time (2). There are not a ton of pieces to clean (awesome) and my daughter had no trouble transitioning from the breast to this bottle nipple and back.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves these bottles I tried so many other brand bottles but my baby didn’t like them. Bottle is easy to wash, easy to travel with. The nipple is soft and great for babies. I would recommend, even though every baby is different still give it a try...... My baby is 9 months now and has been using Avent since she was a new born.....
customer_reviews.author: KayCee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible they leaked onto my newborn sons face.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this product. I used this brand for my first son and fell in love with it and decided to order them again for my youngest son. The bottles leaked non stop onto my newborns face. I thought that maybe it was just one faulty bottle with the nipple but the same thing happened to the rest of the bottles. Clearly the quality of these bottles have gone down since 2015. I will not recommend this brand to anyone anymore and went with Dr brown bottles instead which was a hit with my son. If you do go with these bottles please make sure there is no leakage for your child’s sake!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Best Bottles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bottles at a better price than in the stores. I bought 2 sets. Avent Natural is the way to go. These are the best bottles. I’m not sure how much colic they reduced as my baby still suffered occasionally. Very easy to clean unlike other big brand name bottles. The only con is, if powder formula is shaken in the bottle, sometimes powder gets trapped between the nipple and the white ring, so I remove the nipple from the ring during every wash.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much and our son loves them even more. We have had no problems with them what so ever. This is my second time ordering them just so we have a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as describe! I love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was gifted to me as part of my Baby Registry. It came in on time. I had no problem receiving the bottles. Was very well packaged and secure. It was completed, everything was in there. Nipple comes with a size 2 and pacifiers are from 6-18months old. Perfect if you are breastfeeding so that way nipple still continues to help. So with that being said, only downside is the pacifiers are not meant for newborns and you will need to buy the correct nipple for the bottles. Perfect color as expected as well as the pacifiers. I love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shugey L. Martine,

customer_reviews.title: My baby is less fuzzy and drinks his milk again...
customer_reviews.text: These are a life saver! Take it from me. My little one went from drinking 4oz to 2oz in a different bottle and got extremely fuzzy with a different brand. So my husband and I switched to this one and he’s drinking his 4oz of milk and is much less fuzzy! It’s worth a try if you’re having a hard time with your little one. Not only that, but these are easy to clean and have a longer nipple which my baby loves.
customer_reviews.author: Euyerinis G.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle cap hard to take off
customer_reviews.text: A real pain in the ass to take the cap off...once it's on, you have to fight to pop the damn top off. Try doing that in the middle of the night when trying to feed a hungry baby. Other than that, it's cute and it's functional.
customer_reviews.author: RKP

customer_reviews.title: Second time to get avent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as always.. I bought avent classic bottles six years ago for my first daughter and didn’t hesitate to get the natural ones this time for my second daughter. Avent bottles is the best choice for my little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Maha

customer_reviews.title: The nipple constantly collapse
customer_reviews.text: The nipple constantly collapse. The anti colic one is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite bottles.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I have a bottle addiction and I'm on a mission looking for the perfect bottle for my son because he has a hard time latching due to his tongue tie. I've bought every brand of bottle out there and this is definitely one of my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: KEESHA

customer_reviews.title: Better than the 4oz bottle
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are the best out there. They fit the cap and nipple from the 4oz bottle but you can use them from new born to 1 year old because of the capacity, just need to upgrade the nipples.
customer_reviews.author: Dariel Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Great for breast fed babies
customer_reviews.text: I use these while breast feeding I find it causes no nipple confusion for baby have used these with last 3 of 4 kids and worked great. They sell adapters to pump straight into these bottles on amazon as well. Love scent bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: works for us
customer_reviews.text: We have an exclusively BF newborn baby. I pump for those rainy days when i May need to step out. Last night was that day and she took to these bottles with no problem. She was asleep when i made it back home and husband said she was not fussy or gassy during feeding. That’s a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 4🌺🌺

customer_reviews.title: Everything seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used these yet as my baby hasn't arrived yet. But All items inside were packages nicely. Like the color. Everything does come as advertised. Seen a lot of great reviews, can't wait to try!.... Will give update later.
customer_reviews.author: Donnica

customer_reviews.title: The best bottles!
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are great! I've been using Avent bottles since my first daughter ( she's now 17) and I'm using them again with my third daughter. I have tried other bottles, but I've always come back to Avent! They don't have a lot of parts, they're easy to clean, and my daughter loves them! The purple color is also the cutest!
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: THE BRUSH IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: The bottles and pacifiers are great, too, but the curved brush is worth the entire order! It makes cleaning the bottle, nipples, and caps so easy! I don't have to switch brushes or even unscrew the bottom part. The brush works for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Way easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love these bottles, they’re so easy to clean and my daughter has no issues eating with them. I don’t really love the weird month ranges for nipple flows but I would still recommend these bottles to parents.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie S.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and adorable
customer_reviews.text: I love these. My daughter loves them too. She used the 4oz and would never take another brand. The purple is cute too! We waited for these to come back in stock. Worth it! Only thing is the picture makes them look lavender but they are very dake purple in real life
customer_reviews.author: Harli Dykes

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bottles! They’re the only ones my daughter will take and they’re super easy to clean. I will say that if you don’t align the lock on the top the milk will spill out but I don’t mind taking the extra 3 seconds to do it. My daughter was not a fan of the pacifiers that came along - wish they would include the advent soothies instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best baby bottle i have ever used for my baby. Very easy to suck and my baby drink milk faster with it in addition that it doesn’t leak at all like other bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Sarolenafashion

customer_reviews.title: Good but numbers wore off quickly
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are a pretty color, it’s nice to have something in addition to the clear. However, some of the markings wore off easily on one of the bottles. Not sure if it’s because my bottle warmer gets stupid hot sometimes or if it’s just the bottle. Still like them. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Great first bottle.
customer_reviews.text: No leaks at nipple. My 6-month old grandson can actually manage to get hold of them. He can’t really manipulate them very well but he loves to ‘hold’ them.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not the best out there...
customer_reviews.text: These bottles just weren't right for my son. We also purchased the 1 nipples instead of the 2 they come with and the flow drowned him. Went with another brand and saw a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Kramer

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: yes, nice bottle, nothing want to add. at least haven't found any bad with it .... maybe The nipple part and the lid part don’t fit well, right? but not a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Conan

customer_reviews.title: They leak
customer_reviews.text: These were great bottles, except for the fact that like everyone else on here that complained of leaky nipples, we had the same exact issue. We switched to the Anti colic set and we couldn't be happier. Especially our baby who cries less.
customer_reviews.author: M. Luu

customer_reviews.title: Great to prevent colic and gas on babies.
customer_reviews.text: My newborn baby daughter loves these bottles so I ordered more for her. She get almost no gas and she enjoys drinking her milk from these bottles!! I will recommend it to any mother.
customer_reviews.author: DOMINGA

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good basic product, definitely easy to clean. One thing that annoys me is putting the nipple into the ring, for some reason it takes a few tries because I either push/pull too hard or not hard enough. I am not the biggest fan of the shape of this bottle though I am sure it was mentioned in the description and I just did not see it. Overall, it is a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brand and product! Love Avent products in general!
customer_reviews.text: I used this brand with my youngest two kids and I now I’m purchasing for granddaughter. Great brand, great product, would definitely recommend. Love Avent products.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes these bottles. I liked the pack and it came with the cleaning brush which is better than the regular brushes you get at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bottles
customer_reviews.text: If I was to purchase these again I would just buy the bottles. The bottles work perfectly! Every child is different but my son hated the pacifiers that came with them.
customer_reviews.author: astrait32

customer_reviews.title: Good product but...
customer_reviews.text: The one thing that I had an issue with this is that it was not shipped in a box. It came in it’s original box with amazon packing tape plastered on it. And not in any type of shipping box. All in all product looks good. Glad it wasn’t tampered with. IMG_6915.jpeg IMG_6916.jpeg
customer_reviews.author: Marisol

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift but I use these bottles and I love them! So easy to clean, I put them in the dishwasher. Baby burps great on these. Those are also my favorite binkies for newborns as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole Rivera

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME gift; durable bottles and LOVE the added bonus of the pacifiers!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome “go to gift” and they’re a convenient transition size bottle. They are easy to clean and they are lightweight too. Love the colors and the added bonus of the pacifiers!
customer_reviews.author: Zerry James

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Liked the pink color. These bottles are great at reducing spit up and mimicing breast.
customer_reviews.author: Allenfarm

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bottles
customer_reviews.text: Love the avent bottles. They are cute and I love the colors. My son does well with the shape of the nipples no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love avent
customer_reviews.text: Used these with my first son and it was the only type of bottle he would take, bought this set to my second but he won’t take a bottle at all so I gifted them.
customer_reviews.author: Tember harms

customer_reviews.title: Will always be my favorite bottles.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my niece who just had a baby. They are easy to clean and doesn't give baby gas. I love how they look too. They also have adapters you can buy so you can use them with breast pump (sold separately but adapters are only $10)
customer_reviews.author: Hannahkitty

customer_reviews.title: Love Avent Batural
customer_reviews.text: Love love the Avent Natural bottles. We tried 5 brands of bottles when we brought our new baby home. Hands down the Avent was our favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: My newborn  Choke a lot with the size nipples
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with 0 nipples instead of 0+. My newborn choke a lot because of this 0+. I had to repurchase another one this time size 0 nipples.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, doesn’t leak, no trapped air
customer_reviews.text: Few pieces to clean, never leaks, great for gassy baby’s
customer_reviews.author: Lori R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for newborns! They don't leak when tilted when using the slowest flow nipple!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bottles because their numbers printed do not fade like other bottles. They are easy to clean and the nipples have the perfect flow according to each stage. They don't leak perfect for newborns!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisseth

customer_reviews.title: This was the second time I bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nephew and son, both are 9 months now. We got our use out of these bottles and no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin R.

customer_reviews.title: Good for gifting, good for keeping
customer_reviews.text: These are my baby's favorite pacifiers and the blue bottles are so cool. Would definitely buy again gir myself or a gift.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Includes an amazing baby cleaning brush !
customer_reviews.text: Good quality , easy to clean . I love the brush that it comes with it is the best baby bottle Brush I have ever owned !
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ebbitt

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I love this but most importantly my baby loves it!!! Only issue was the bottle cleaner wouldn’t clean as well as my others.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Did not get the pacifiers as mentioned on the box and description
customer_reviews.text: We will be returning this as we did not get the 2 pacifiers as mentioned in the box . Otherwise the product looks sturdy and neat.
customer_reviews.author: Preethi Mani

customer_reviews.title: My sisters likes it. I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister, she’s going to be a first time mommy. I love this set because it comes with the brush and the 2 binkys. I think it’s a perfect kit that will definitely come in handy. I would for sure buy another one and will be purchasing one when I have kids.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Villanueva Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Best product..
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to wash.. I used other brands but this is the thus far the best and practical use. I have two kids and used for both of my kids. I wold totally recommend to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: Baba

customer_reviews.title: Missing bottle
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited to use these, but unfortunately the set was missing 1 of the 9 Oz bottles, and that's upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: valerie owens

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Use the little bottles first and then graduate to the bigger bottles. The design is really cute too
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Kimmell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a baby shower gift for my daughter. She loves them and grandaughter does to. Easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: NanaJis reading

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOTTLES!!!....wrong color sent to me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered teal... but received purple... my daughter needs the bottles so I'm not even going to bother. But other than that flub-up I love these bottles and nipples. They are the only one that my daughter wont leak out the sides of her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: RDale

customer_reviews.title: Philip's Avent bottles/(bonus) pacifiers
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bottles and even better are the pacifiers that came with them. I was having a hard time finding the right nipple for my son and these just happened to be what he likes. I do however wish that the 4oz bottles could be sold as a set of just 2. And in color. Makes it so much easier my niece lives with us and has the same brand of bottles I loved that I could order my sons in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: LETICIA TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Bottles Mines Package Had Been Used Already
customer_reviews.text: The box was open and the bottle has been used and also the nipples. Highly upset and it's a waste of time to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Stefyneec Brady

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price for all that comes with. Retail stores charge same price for half the bottles. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Nordstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: These are our go-to bottles. We love them, and so do our 4 month olds! The pacifiers work with their “soothie snuggles”, too!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: We love this brand but Amazon must do better
customer_reviews.text: Bottles are great! Great color as well. The pacifiers on the other hand are a no go, the nipple is too round, my daughter likes other Philips avent pacifiers better, but in a pinch it will do! I didn’t appreciate how they were shipped, they were not put into any type of addition shipping box or bag just in its original box with a shipping label attached to the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks leaks
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are pretty easy to clean, and they are pretty nice. But they started leaking after some time. They leak so much I have to put a thick towel under her when I feed her. I’m going to try buying a new top/nipple, if that doesn’t work I’m gonna have to buy new bottles. Babies are expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Maria F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for breastfeeding moms
customer_reviews.text: These are the only bottles my 1 month old will take. I’m breastfeeding & bottle feeding too & haven’t had any problems going back & forth. I’ve tried the Comotomo & Tommy Tippee bottles & she gets fussy with those. Haven’t had any issues with colic or gas pains so these are definitely a win. Super easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s great set 🍼
customer_reviews.text: This is what I expected! had delivery issues but worth it. Great set and my favorite color. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G.

customer_reviews.title: A better deal than buying 4oz and 9oz bottle separately
customer_reviews.text: This is a better deal than buying the two sizes of bottles separately, because each costs about 7-9 dollars per bottle if buying those trio sets.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 5 months. Durable, easy to clean and they do not leak! Need to buy more!! They are expensive but so are most of the bottles-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl loves these bottles. We’ve tried others but these are much easier to clean and they are such a cute color. No issues with gassiness either.
customer_reviews.author: Jalanna

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had these bottles for a month now and I love them. They're easy to wash and keep they're color, I haven't noticed any chips or scratches either.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Avent is best
customer_reviews.text: I used Avent bottles for both of my babies and I was happy to gift it for a baby shower
customer_reviews.author: J

product_meta.title: Philips Avent Natural Baby Bottle Blue Gift Set, SCD206/12
product_meta.description: Color:BluePhilips Avent SCD206/12 BPA Free Natural Blue Infant Starter Set is the most natural way to start bottle feeding. The 5 BPA-free Natural blue bottles included in this kit feature wide breast-shaped nipples with unique comfort petals promoting natural latch on and making it easy to combine breast and bottle feeding. The bottles have an advanced anti-colic system with innovative colic-reducing valve designed for less air in baby's tummy and a more comfortable feeding experience. The soft, flexible nipple mimics the feel of the breast. The set includes 2 Natural 9 ounce/260ml blue bottles with 2 Natural slow flow nipples, 3 Natural 4 ounce/125ml blue bottles with 3 Natural newborn nipples, Bottle Brush, and 2 Soothie Pacifiers (0-3m). The Bottle Brush's curved brush head and molded tip cleans hard to reach areas. Soothie Pacifiers are used by medical professionals to calm newborns, the highly durable pacifier’s features hospital grade silicone and one piece construction.
feature_bullets: Ideal starter set for the new mom with multiple bottle and nipple sizes and bottle accessories
Natural wide nipple shape and ultra soft feel makes it easy for baby to combine with breastfeeding
Ultra soft nipple mimics the feel of the breast
Unique Airflex vent technology integrated into the nipple is designed to reduce feeding issues by venting air away from your baby's tummy
Includes 3.4 ounce bottles, 2.9 ounce bottles, bottle brush, and 2 Soothie pacifiers; Material: Plastic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars4,343 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
